name: Exponential Equation
statement: You are given an integer $$$n$$$. Find any pair of integers $$$(x,y)$$$ ($$$1\leq x,y\leq n$$$) such that $$$x^y\cdot y+y^x\cdot x = n$$$.
inputFormat: The first line contains a single integer $$$t$$$ ($$$1\leq t\leq 10^4$$$) â€” the number of test cases. Each test case contains one line with a single integer $$$n$$$ ($$$1\leq n\leq 10^9$$$).
outputFormat: For each test case, if possible, print two integers $$$x$$$ and $$$y$$$ ($$$1\leq x,y\leq n$$$). If there are multiple answers, print any. Otherwise, print $$$-1$$$.
